Reviews.Title: Best Decision I Ever Made
Reviews.Author: James Falk
Reviews.Content: Bought it on clearance due to not having a built in tuner. Has worked perfect for 3 years now, the picture looks just as good as when I bought it.

Reviews.Title: excellant
Reviews.Author: robert harris "rharris"
Reviews.Content: this television has lived up to expectations and more. the picture is great.the price was a value and the sound quality is superior.

Reviews.Title: Worse TV ever made
Reviews.Author: Rike D. Miller "Spike"
Reviews.Content: We are now getting a Sony after 2 of these Toshiba's blew up. The first one made loud popping noises, and then after being only 2 days old the whole picture became distorted. We got a replacement, that after a week, it started making popping noises and the convergence has to be realigned. Now it can no longer be aligned in the corners. Do not trust this model!
